text: Chuk and Gek () is a 1953 Soviet comedy-drama movie directed by Ivan Lukinsky.Квест в зоопарке и рождественская кондитерская: куда сходить с ребенком в праздникиЧук и Гек (1953) It stars Yura Chuchunov, Andrei Chilikin, and Dmitri Pavlov. ==Actors== * Yura Chuchunov as Chuk * Andrei Chilikin as Gek * Dmitri Pavlov as Father * Vera Vasilyeva as Mother * Nikolai Komissarov as Watchman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 comedy-drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Lukinsky
title: Chuk and Gek (movie)
